short_summary: This procurement is for the acquisition of audit services from an external auditing firm.
description: The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat is seeking to acquire the services of a professional auditing firm to provide audit services.  The audit services will include examination of receipts and disbursements of the Office of the Auditor General. The contract start date is expected to be October 1st, 2023 and the contract end date is expected to be October 31st, 2028. The bid solicitation is issued under the framework of the Professional Audit Support Services Supply Arrangement (Pass SA Stream #5)
full_summary:
**Title:**
External Auditor Services for the Office of the Auditor General of Canada
================================

**Reference Number:**
cb-5704-76817761
--------------------------------

**Tender Status:**
Expired
-----------------

**Classification:**
Audit Services (84111600)
---------------------------

**Notice Type:**
Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
---------------------------------------------

**Procurement Method:**
Competitive - Selective Tendering
----------------------------

**Contract Period:**
10/01/2023 - 10/31/2028
-------------------------

**Eligibility:**
The solicitation is open to all bidders who are interested in providing External Auditor Services and meet the specified qualifications.

**Scope of Work:**

The selected bidder will be required to:

* Examine the receipts and disbursements of the Office of the Auditor General
* Prepare a report of the outcome of their examinations for each of the fiscal years ending March 31, 2024; March 31, 2025; March 31, 2026; March 31, 2027; and March 31, 2028

**Accompanying Documents:**

The solicitation documents are available in both English and French. Interested bidders can download the documents from the following links:

* English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5704/23-657-npp-english-version_0.pdf
* French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5704/23-657-npp-french-version_1.pdf

**Points of Contact:**

For any inquiries related to this solicitation, please contact Lars Norgaard at:

* Email: lars.norgaard@tbs-sct.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 550-7003
* Address: 90 Elgin, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R5
